page.title: 05The Butcher (1 of 2 pages)
page.content: We interviewed a butcher, {DO MOST PEOPLE SHOP LOCALLY?} I'm quite lucky, people have shopped with me for years and they are regular customers.Some people now go into Norwich or Wroxham but I do well enough. {WHAT DO YOU THINK OF CITY SHOPS? } Butchering is butchering. We buy in some meat and we kill some of our own. We provide the same service as city butchers, it's only the big shops like Tesco and Sainsbury's that do us damage because they can buy in bulk and sell cheaper. But if you want friendly service or just a wee bit of meat we're the ones to see. {WHAT DO YOU THINK OF TOURISTS? }They don't bother us apart from sometimes in the middle of summer. Otherwise they stay up the other end of the town. (interview continued)
